flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
人間が　科学の　力で　つくりだした。
人工　知能を　持たせたので　新しい
仕草や　感情を　ひとりで　覚えていく。

Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science.
The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial
intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions
on its own.

Porygon2 è una creatura artificiale frutto del sapere scientifico.
Questo Pokémon è dotato di un’intelligenza artificiale che
gli consente d’imparare autonomamente nuovi comportamenti
ed emozioni.

Porygon2 fue creado por el hombre gracias a los avances de
la ciencia. Esta obra humana ha sido provista de inteligencia
artificial que le permite aprender gestos y sensaciones nuevas
por su cuenta.

Porygon2 wurde in einem wissenschaftlichen Experiment
von Menschen erzeugt. Es verfügt über künstliche Intelligenz,
wodurch es selbstständig neue Gesten und Gefühle erlernen
kann.

Porygon2 fut créé par des humains grâce aux progrès
de la science. Ce Pokémon a été doté d’une intelligence
artificielle qui lui permet d’apprendre de nouveaux
mouvements et des émotions par lui-même.

인간이 과학의 힘으로 만들어냈다.
인공 지능을 지니고 있어서 새로운
동작이나 감정을 혼자서 익혀간다.

にんげんが　かがくの　ちからで　つくりだした。
じんこう　ちのうを　もたせたので　あたらしい
しぐさや　かんじょうを　ひとりで　おぼえていく。

人間が　科学の　力で　つくりだした。
人工　知能を　持たせたので　新しい
仕草や　感情を　ひとりで　覚えていく。

Porygon2 was created by humans using the power of science.
The man-made Pokémon has been endowed with artificial
intelligence that enables it to learn new gestures and emotions
on its own.

Porygon2 è una creatura artificiale frutto del sapere scientifico.
Questo Pokémon è dotato di un’intelligenza artificiale che
gli consente d’imparare autonomamente nuovi comportamenti
ed emozioni.

Porygon2 fue creado por el hombre gracias a los avances de
la ciencia. Esta obra humana ha sido provista de inteligencia
artificial que le permite aprender gestos y sensaciones nuevas
por su cuenta.

Porygon2 wurde in einem wissenschaftlichen Experiment
von Menschen erzeugt. Es verfügt über künstliche Intelligenz,
wodurch es selbstständig neue Gesten und Gefühle erlernen
kann.

Porygon2 fut créé par des humains grâce aux progrès
de la science. Ce Pokémon a été doté d’une intelligence
artificielle qui lui permet d’apprendre de nouveaux
mouvements et des émotions par lui-même.

인간이 과학의 힘으로 만들어냈다.
인공 지능을 지니고 있어서 새로운
동작이나 감정을 혼자서 익혀간다.

にんげんが　かがくの　ちからで　つくりだした。
じんこう　ちのうを　もたせたので　あたらしい
しぐさや　かんじょうを　ひとりで　おぼえていく。

惑星開発用の　プログラムが
インストールされている。
真空の　宇宙でも　活動できるのだ。

With planetary development software installed,
it became capable of working in space.

Gli è stato installato un programma di sviluppo
planetario che lo rende capace di lavorare nello
spazio.

Tiene instalado un avanzado software astrofísico que
le permite trabajar en el espacio.

Interstellare Software wurde installiert, sodass
dieses Pokémon sich auch im All bewegen kann.

On lui a installé un logiciel de terraformation pour
lui permettre de travailler dans l’espace.

행성 개발용 프로그램이
인스톨되어 있다. 우주와 같은
진공 공간에서도 활동할 수 있다.

わくせいかいはつようの　プログラムが
インストールされている。しんくうの
うちゅうでも　かつどうできるのだ。

さらに　研究が　進められ
能力が　高まった。ときどき
プログラムにない　仕草を　見せる。

Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes,
it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.

Ricerche avanzate hanno potenziato le sue capacità.
Ora può fare movimenti che non erano programmati.

La investigación mejoró sus habilidades. A veces,
puede actuar de forma no programada.

Seine Fähigkeiten wurden verbessert. Es zeigt
manchmal sogar Handlungen, die nicht
einprogrammiert sind.

Des recherches poussées ont amélioré ses capacités.
Il a appris de nouveaux mouvements.

더욱 연구가 진행되어
능력이 올라갔다. 가끔
프로그램에 없는 행동을 보인다.

さらに　けんきゅうが　すすめられ
のうりょくが　たかまった。ときどき
プログラムにない　しぐさを　みせる。

It was upgraded to enable the
exploration of other planets.
However, it failed to measure up.

It was upgraded to enable the
exploration of other planets.
However, it failed to measure up.

It was upgraded to enable the
exploration of other planets.
However, it failed to measure up.

Il a subi une mise à jour censée lui
permettre d’explorer d’autres
planètes... C’est un échec.

It was upgraded to enable the
exploration of other planets.
However, it failed to measure up.

Il a subi une mise à jour censée lui
permettre d’explorer d’autres
planètes... C’est un échec.

Further research enhanced its 
abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit
motions that were not programmed.

This upgraded version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can’t fly, however.

It was upgraded to enable the
exploration of other planets.
However, it failed to measure up.

With planetary development
software installed, it became
capable of working in space.

With planetary development
software installed, it became
capable of working in space.

This upgraded version of PORYGON is
designed for space exploration. However,
it can’t even fly.

Further research enhanced its abilities.
Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that
were not programmed.

It was created by humans using the power
of science. It has been given artificial
intelligence that enables it to learn new
gestures and emotions on its own.

PORYGON2 was created by humans using
the power of science. The man-made
POKéMON has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it
to learn new gestures and emotions
on its own.

PORYGON2 was created by humans using
the power of science. The man-made
POKéMON has been endowed with artificial intelligence that enables it
to learn new gestures and emotions
on its own.

This manmade
POKéMON evolved
from the latest technology. It
may have unprog­
rammed reactions.

Further research
enhanced its abil­
ities. Sometimes, it may exhibit
motions that were
not programmed.

This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.
